meanings.sent1: The antiabortionists gathered outside the clinic to protest.
meanings.sent2: Many antiabortionists believe in the sanctity of life.
meanings.sent3: The antiabortionists held up signs with strong messages.
meanings.sent4: In the debate, the antiabortionists stood firm in their beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The group of antiabortionists voiced their concerns at the meeting.

meanings.definition: Those who are against the practice of abortion.
meanings.sent1: She listened to the antiabortionists' arguments with interest.
meanings.sent2: The antiabortionists' views on abortion are well-known.
meanings.sent3: The antiabortionists' rally had a serious tone.
meanings.sent4: The antiabortionists' stance on the issue was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The antiabortionists' presence at the event sparked discussions.
